changeSet.author: Tarun

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Suspected HSIL with lesion > 75 percentage of cervical surface", "Suspected HSIL with lesion extending into cervical canal", "Suspected HSIL with SCJ not fully visualized", "Other indication") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "LP, LEEP Indication");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to LP, LEEP Indication

changeSet.author: Tarun
